#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

#define LL int

#define gc getchar_unlocked()

inline void inp(LL &x)

{
    register LL c = gc ;
    x = 0;
    for(; ((c<48 || c>57)); c = gc );
    for(; c>47 && c<58 ; c = gc )x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int m,n,i,j;
        int dp[509][509]={0},a[509][509]={0};
        cin>>n>>m;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        for(j=0;j<m;j++)
        scanf("%d",&a[i][j]);
        //dp[n-1][m-1]=((m+n)%2)?-a[n-1][m-1]:a[n-1][m-1];
        for(i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
            for(j=m-1;j>=0;j--)
            {
               if((i+j)%2)
               {
                   //maximize
                    if(i<n-1)dp[i][j]=dp[i+1][j];
                    else if(j<m-1)dp[i][j]=dp[i][j+1];
                    if(j<m-1 && dp[i][j+1]>dp[i][j])
                        dp[i][j]=dp[i][j+1];
                    dp[i][j]-=a[i][j];
                    //cout<<a[i][j]<<endl;
               }
               else
               {
                   //minimize
                    if(i<n-1)dp[i][j]=dp[i+1][j];
                    else if(j<m-1)dp[i][j]=dp[i][j+1];
                    if(j<m-1 && dp[i][j+1]<dp[i][j])
                        dp[i][j]=dp[i][j+1];
                    dp[i][j]+=a[i][j];
                    //cout<<a[i][j]<<endl;
               }
            }
          /*  for(i=0;i<=4;i++)
            {
                for(j=0;j<=4;j++)
                    cout<<dp[i][j]<<"  ";
                cout<<endl;
            }
            */cout<<dp[0][0]<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
